attributes.action: Sever diplomatic relations with the Russian Federation
attributes.additional_details:
Sanctions have failed! Russia authorities have been linked to several murders in the UK, and now the Russian Federation has invaded a friendly country.
 
We, the signatories to this Petition, call upon HM Government to sever diplomatic relations with the Russian Federation.
attributes.background: The Government should cut off all diplomatic relations with the Russian Federation, to send a clear message.
